parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake wear and imbalance can lead to reduced stopping power, increased stopping distances, and potentially cause accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Hard Brake Pedal and Delayed Stopping
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A hard brake pedal and delayed stopping response can increase stopping distances, leading to accidents and potentially causing injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: few-second delay before the vehicle comes to a stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loss of Steering Control when Braking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loss of steering control when braking can cause accidents, especially at low speeds, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Loss of steering control when applying brakes

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can cause poor visibility, especially during rainy or snowy conditions, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The windshield wipers turn on and off intermittently

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The noise and draft from the windows can cause driver distraction and discomfort, which can lead to accidents or decreased vehicle safety.
symptoms: The windows of the vehicle experience noise and draft

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Hinge and Latch Mechanism Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door hinge and latch mechanism can cause doors to rattle, make noise, and even prevent them from opening from the inside, potentially trapping occupants inside the vehicle.
symptoms: doors will not open from the inside
doors are difficult to open or close
